nodes.description: 27人死于大马士革安全建筑连环爆炸，首枚炸弹7:30袭击空军情报局
nodes.support_text: the first bomb targeted an Air Force intelligence building in the residential district of al-Qassaa, a predominantly Christian area, and went off around 7:30 a.m. local time.

nodes.description: 同日几乎同时第二枚炸弹袭击刑事安全局
nodes.support_text: Another bomb, going off almost simultaneously with the first one, targeted the Criminal Security Department.

nodes.description: 同日傍晚第三枚炸弹在难民营附近引爆自杀式炸弹
nodes.support_text: Later in the day, a third blast went off near a military bus at a Palestinian refugee camp in Yarmouk.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生于叙利亚革命一周年纪念日前两天
nodes.support_text: The explosions come two days after the one-year anniversary of the uprisings against President Bashar Al-Assad’s government.

nodes.description: 近三个月大马士革发生6起针对情报局等安全建筑的自杀式袭击
nodes.support_text: Damascus has seen a half dozen suicide bombing over the last three months.

nodes.description: 2012年12月以来叙利亚持续发生多起袭击事件
nodes.support_text: They are the latest in a string of attacks shaking the country since December.

nodes.description: 2013年2月10日阿勒颇自杀式爆炸造成28人死亡
nodes.support_text: The last major suicide bombing, in Aleppo on February 10, claimed 28 lives.

nodes.description: 叙利亚政府指控恐怖组织颠覆政权，反对派称政府策划袭击
nodes.support_text: Syrian government blamed terrorist groups attempting to destabilize the country.

nodes.description: 美国情报官员推测袭击者与伊拉克基地组织有关
nodes.support_text: top US intelligence officials said the likely culprit was al-Qaeda in Iraq.

nodes.description: 安南呼吁国际社会推动叙利亚和平解决
nodes.support_text: Kofi Annan, the UN-Arab league envoy to Syria, urged the international community to unite in the push for a peaceful resolution to the conflict.

nodes.description: 阿拉伯联盟谴责暴力并要求立即停火
nodes.support_text: Arab League chief Nabil Elaraby condemned the twin bombings, and called in a statement for 'an immediate halt of all acts of violence regardless of the source'.

nodes.description: 联合国-阿拉伯联盟特使计划下周派专家团队赴叙
nodes.support_text: Annans will send a technical mission to Syria next week to discuss the introduction of foreign monitors.

nodes.description: 第三枚炸弹爆炸导致两名自杀式炸弹袭击者死亡
nodes.support_text: 第三枚炸弹爆炸导致两名自杀式炸弹袭击者死亡

Arab League chief Nabil Elaraby condemned the twin bombings, and called in a statement for 'an immediate halt of all acts of violence regardless of the source'.
